statements: DELETE FROM rental_reservations WHERE customer_name = 'Alice Doe';
DELETE FROM rental_reservations WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND bicycle_model = 'Mountain Bike';
DELETE FROM bicycles WHERE type = 'Mountain Bike';
DELETE FROM bicycles WHERE bike_id = 5 AND rental_price <= 50.00;
DELETE FROM rentals WHERE rental_date < '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 10;
DELETE FROM rental_reservations WHERE rental_id = 123 AND customer_id = 456
DELETE FROM bicycles WHERE model = 'Mountain Bike' AND price_per_hour > 20.00;
